name: Paper Of Death
description:
STORY:
You find yourself in a forest, in the middle of the night and your goal is to collect the 5 pages without being spotted by the 3 monsters

GAMEDEVLOG:
you can find a video of the game creation in my youtube channel (TheGameDev)

CODE SOURCE OF GAME:
this game are created with unreal engine 4.18, if you want the code source of the game he cost  just 1$(you can find them in my profil)
